long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a link between users of DISTILL x 5 and the TTB's online portal, Pay.gov, for the purposes of expediting completion of Federal Production, Storage, and Processing reports. For this extension to work, a user must have login access to both Dx5 and Pay.gov. The user is solely responsible for ensuring the accuracy of numbers submitted to Pay.gov.
